sql-select.name: GetListOfProceduresWithoutSetNocountOn
sql-select.description: Identify procedures that doesn't have ''SET NOCOUNT ON'' statements
sql-select.sql-select-text:
SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSU.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[xtype] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[crdate] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [dbo].[sysobjects] tSO INNER JOIN [dbo].[sysusers] tSU ON tSU.[uid] = tSO.[uid] LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT t.[id] FROM [dbo].[syscomments] t WHERE OBJECTPROPERTY(t.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND t.[text] COLLATE DATABASE_DEFAULT LIKE N'%SET NOCOUNT ON%' ) AS GoodProcs ON tSO.[id] = GoodProcs.[id] WHERE tSO.[xtype] = N'P' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND GoodProcs.[id] IS NULL AND tSO.[name] NOT IN ( N'sp_helpdiagrams' ,N'sp_upgraddiagrams' ) GROUP BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[xtype] ,tSO.[crdate] ORDER BY tSU.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;

SET NOCOUNT ON; SET DEADLOCK_PRIORITY LOW;
SELECT tSS.[name] AS [SchemaName] ,tSO.[name] AS [ObjectName] ,tSO.[type_desc] AS [ObjectType] ,tSO.[create_date] AS [ObjectCreateDate] FROM [sys].[objects] tSO INNER JOIN [sys].[schemas] tSS ON tSS.[schema_id] = tSO.[schema_id] LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT t.[object_id] FROM [sys].[objects] t WHERE t.[type_desc] = N'SQL_STORED_PROCEDURE' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(t.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND Object_Definition(t.[object_id]) LIKE N'%SET NOCOUNT ON%' ) AS GoodProcs ON tSO.[object_id] = GoodProcs.[object_id] WHERE tSO.[type_desc] = N'SQL_STORED_PROCEDURE' AND OBJECTPROPERTY(tSO.[object_id], N'IsMSShipped') = 0 AND GoodProcs.[object_id] IS NULL AND tSO.[name] NOT IN ( N'sp_helpdiagrams' ,N'sp_upgraddiagrams' ) GROUP BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ,tSO.[type_desc] ,tSO.[create_date] ORDER BY tSS.[name] ,tSO.[name] ;
